turns.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your service. To help troubleshoot this and check your account, could you please provide your phone number or full name and date of birth for verification?
My name is John Smith, and my phone number is 555-123-2002. I don't remember my date of birth off the top of my headâ€”does that matter right now?
